post.description: Can be use as ShippingAddress or BillingAddress
Useful to store a private document on Shippingbo before using it as an invoice, CN23, proforma invoice or dematerialized document
Useful to store a public document on Shippingbo before using it as an invoice, CN23, proforma invoice or dematerialized document
It allows linking an UploadedFile to an Order, then it can be printed with the shipping label or sent to the carrier in case of dematerialized documents

get.description: Returns main information of an Order
Returns main information of a Product

expected_serials.description: This is the list of the expected serials numbers

parameters.name: search[state]
parameters.description: To filter on the SupplyCapsule state

skip_expected_items_creation.description: By default, all the products from the original order are automatically created for the new ReturnOrder. But you can pass the parameter `skip_expected_items_creation: true` to avoid this automatic creation and just create the products you defined in the *return_order_expected_items_attributes* parameter

get.summary: Get preparation run packing slip information

location.description: This is where the product must be picked

source.description: The source of the order item

source_ref.description: The source_ref of the order item

product_ref.description: This is the ref of the offer

product_ean.description: This is the ean13 of the offer

errors.message: Mapped product already recomputed: stock recompute not finished, retry later

post.description: The creation of a Shipment is going to ship or partialy ship an Order

patch.summary: Update a product with SKU or EAN

physical_stock.description: The stock will be recomputed with orders reserving stock

product_key.description: The key to use user_ref or ean13

variation.description: Can be positive to increment or negative to decrement

product_id.description: Use only if you don't use product_key and user_ref/ean13

upload_id.description:
The ID of the stock change upload.

The uploaded file contain the stock variations.

The result file contain the result of each linked variations.

The line ref on the result file is linked to the line of the uploaded file.

variation.description: Can be positive to increment or negative to decrement

source.description: Source of the product (mandatory with source_ref)

source_ref.description: Source_ref of the product (mandatory with source)

post.description:
To identify the product, use only source/source_ref or product_id .
Every rows must have the same Identify way

parameters.name: orderDocumentId
parameters.description: The ID of the requested OrderDocument

parameters.name: orderDocumentId
parameters.description: The ID of the requested OrderDocument

parameters.name: base64
parameters.description: If present (with any value), file will be returned in base64 encoding

get.description: Download associtated document of an OrderDocument like invoice, packing slip...

parameters.name: search[carrier_id__eq]
parameters.description: Useful to get all shipping service of a carrier

Example 1.origin: stock origin (list of values depending of client config)
Example 1.destination: stock destination (list of values depending of client config)
Example 1.reason: movement reason (list of values depending of client config)

post.description: Usefull if you want to add or remove stock of a warehouse slot

Address.title: Address
Address.description: Address object is used for billing and shipping address, must be created before create an order

merchant_country.description: Country of the merchant, usually the country of the shipper address

tracking_url.description: This is where the customer can see its tracking

label_url.description: The URL to download the shipping label

shipping_method_name.description: The shipping method used to ship the order

source_ref.description: The reference on the source of the order

shipping_address_id.description: The id of the shipping Address previously created

billing_address_id.description: The id of the billing Address previously created

origin_ref.description: The reference on the origin, can be the same as source

origin_created_at.description: The creation date on the origin

chosen_delivery_service.description: This is the delivery method selected by the customer

fulfilled_by_marketplace.description: Order is directly fulfilled by the marketplace

relay_ref.description: The ref of the pickup location

order_items_attributes.description:
When you create an OrderItem you have to remove the id from the object. The id will be returned by the API
Only used at creation

tags_to_add.description:
Only used on create.
Each tags will be created as an OrderTag

order_item_value.description: The additional reference you want to map

product_value.description: The Shippingbo id of the corresponding product

source.description: This is where the product come from

source_ref.description: The is the reference on the source

user_ref.description: The main reference of the product, usually useful to match product reference if orders

stock.description: Current available stock of the product

location.description: Can be the location of the product in your warehouse

total_physical_stock.description: Only for OMS: total physical stock computed from suppliers

supplier_product_ids.description: This a reference to the suppliers, you can request each of them and look at the physical stock and available stock if you need the information

preparation_packages_count.description: This the number of packages in the preparation run

return_order_type.description:
Type of the return:
- return_order_label: when created from a label
- return_order_carrier: when the carrier returns the parcel
- return_order_customer: when the customer ask for a return

return_order_expected_items.description: This is the list of the expected content of the return

return_order_items.description: This is the list of returned procuts

returned_product_not_restockables.description: This is the list of products that cannot be restocked

return_label_config_id.description: The label config used to generate the linked label

shipping_ref.description: The shipping reference/tracking number of the return shipment

barcode.description: When possible we can save the label barcode

user_ref.description: The reference you provide when creating the item

product_user_ref.description: The reference of the product in Shippingbo

user_id.description: The user who shipped the order

stock.description: The new stock of the product

tracking_url.description: The common carrier URL to follow the tracking

Example 1.origin: stock origin (list of values depending of client config)
Example 1.destination: stock destination (list of values depending of client config)
Example 1.reason: movement reason (list of values depending of client config)

SlotStockVariation.description: You must use this endpoint to add or remove stock when you have warehouse slots

supplier_ref.description:
The **supplier_ref** must match a **reseller_ref** on the supplier Shippingbo account.
Once the SupplierProduct is linked to the Supplier he can update the available_stock and physical_stock

available_stock.description: The is the available stock computed from your supplier Shippingbo account

physical_stock.description: This is the physical stock computed on the supplier Shippingbo account
